members.name: DOMException()
members.description: Returns a DOMException object with a specified message and name.

parameters.name: message Optional
parameters.description: A description of the exception. If not present, the empty string '' is used.

parameters.name: name Optional
parameters.description: Returns a DOMString that contains one of the strings associated with an error constant.

members.name: DOMException.code
members.description: Returns a short that contains one of the error code constants, or 0 if none match. This field is used for historical reasons, new kind of DOM exceptions don't use anymore: they put this info in the DOMException.name attribute.

members.name: DOMException.name
members.description: Returns a DOMString that contains one of the strings associated with an error name.

members.name: IndexSizeError
members.description: The index is not in the allowed range. For example, this can be thrown by Range object. (Legacy code value: 1 and legacy constant name: INDEX_SIZE_ERR)

members.name: HierarchyRequestError
members.description: The node tree hierarchy is not correct. (Legacy code value: 3 and legacy constant name: HIERARCHY_REQUEST_ERR)

members.name: WrongDocumentError
members.description: The object is in the wrong Document. (Legacy code value: 4 and legacy constant name: WRONG_DOCUMENT_ERR)

members.name: InvalidCharacterError
members.description: The string contains invalid characters. (Legacy code value: 5 and legacy constant name: INVALID_CHARACTER_ERR)

members.name: NoModificationAllowedError
members.description: The object can not be modified. (Legacy code value: 7 and legacy constant name: NO_MODIFICATION_ALLOWED_ERR)

members.name: NotFoundError
members.description: The object can not be found here. (Legacy code value: 8 and legacy constant name: NOT_FOUND_ERR)

members.name: NotSupportedError
members.description: The operation is not supported. (Legacy code value: 9 and legacy constant name: NOT_SUPPORTED_ERR)

members.name: InvalidStateError
members.description: The object is in an invalid state. (Legacy code value: 11 and legacy constant name: INVALID_STATE_ERR)

members.name: SyntaxError
members.description: The string did not match the expected pattern. (Legacy code value: 12 and legacy constant name: SYNTAX_ERR)

members.name: InvalidModificationError
members.description: The object can not be modified in this way. (Legacy code value: 13 and legacy constant name: INVALID_MODIFICATION_ERR)

members.name: NamespaceError
members.description: The operation is not allowed by Namespaces in XML. (Legacy code value: 14 and legacy constant name: NAMESPACE_ERR)

members.name: InvalidAccessError
members.description: The object does not support the operation or argument. (Legacy code value: 15 and legacy constant name: INVALID_ACCESS_ERR)

members.name: TypeMismatchError
members.description: The type of the object does not match the expected type. (Legacy code value: 17 and legacy constant name: TYPE_MISMATCH_ERR) This value is deprecated, the JavaScript TypeError exception is now raised instead of a DOMException with this value.

members.name: SecurityError
members.description: The operation is insecure. (Legacy code value: 18 and legacy constant name: SECURITY_ERR)

members.name: NetworkError
members.description: A network error occurred. (Legacy code value: 19 and legacy constant name: NETWORK_ERR)

members.name: AbortError
members.description: The operation was aborted. (Legacy code value: 20 and legacy constant name: ABORT_ERR)

members.name: URLMismatchError
members.description: The given URL does not match another URL. (Legacy code value: 21 and legacy constant name: URL_MISMATCH_ERR)

members.name: QuotaExceededError
members.description: The quota has been exceeded. (Legacy code value: 22 and legacy constant name: QUOTA_EXCEEDED_ERR)

members.name: TimeoutError
members.description: The operation timed out. (Legacy code value: 23 and legacy constant name: TIMEOUT_ERR)

members.name: InvalidNodeTypeError
members.description: The node is incorrect or has an incorrect ancestor for this operation. (Legacy code value: 24 and legacy constant name: INVALID_NODE_TYPE_ERR)

members.name: DataCloneError
members.description: The object can not be cloned. (Legacy code value: 25 and legacy constant name: DATA_CLONE_ERR)

members.name: EncodingError
members.description: The encoding or decoding operation failed (No legacy code value and constant name).

members.name: NotReadableError
members.description: The input/output read operation failed (No legacy code value and constant name).

members.name: UnknownError
members.description: The operation failed for an unknown transient reason (e.g. out of memory) (No legacy code value and constant name).

members.name: ConstraintError
members.description: A mutation operation in a transaction failed because a constraint was not satisfied (No legacy code value and constant name).

members.name: DataError
members.description: Provided data is inadequate (No legacy code value and constant name).

members.name: TransactionInactiveError
members.description: A request was placed against a transaction which is currently not active, or which is finished (No legacy code value and constant name).

members.name: ReadOnlyError
members.description: The mutating operation was attempted in a "readonly" transaction (No legacy code value and constant name).

members.name: VersionError
members.description: An attempt was made to open a database using a lower version than the existing version (No legacy code value and constant name).

members.name: OperationError
members.description: The operation failed for an operation-specific reason (No legacy code value and constant name).

members.name: NotAllowedError
members.description: The request is not allowed by the user agent or the platform in the current context, possibly because the user denied permissionÂ (No legacy code value and constant name).
